entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:08 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:08 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
